# API Documentation

*Last updated: 2025-08-19 17:42:50*

## Overview

This section contains automatically generated API documentation for the MCP Server.


## Sections

- **[Workflows](workflows.md)** - MCP Workflow documentation

- **[Tools](tools.md)** - MCP Tools documentation

- **[Schemas](schemas.md)** - Data schemas and models


## Auto-Generation

This documentation is automatically generated from the source code using `scripts/generate_api_docs.py`.

To update the documentation, run:

```bash

python scripts/generate_api_docs.py

```
